posts.post_content:
decided not to persue the monster after all. not looking to turn a profit, just recoup my investments and move the funds to other areas. 

Cy Young - Polar Bear - PSA 5 - $1500
Addie Joss Throwing - SGC 84 - $1200
Evers Chicago - SGC 80 - $700
Clancy - SGC 84 - $450
Joss Portrait - PSA 4 - $400


I will accept offers, but i think these prices are more than fair, they're all what i purchased the cards for.

These have gone to eBay. Feel free to search them out and bid :)
